page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SUSAN
page.content: My name is Susan and I am twelve years old. I attend Dolphinton Primary School. There are fourteen pupils in the school - 9 boys and 5 girls. We have two teachers. I attend the school from 9am to 3.30pm. Today it is the Carluke Upperward Sports, and I am entered for three events - the 100m, 200m and the standing longjump. the competitors from our school are all dressed in black tracksuits with red stripes, which is the school colours. We went to Carluke by bus, and when we got there we were joined by other small schools. I won my three events, breaking the record for the standing longjump by 2cm by jumping a distance of 197cm. After we got home I had tea then went for a ride on my bicycle. Later I went to the hall to play badminton which I enjoy very much. I had my bath and went upstairs to bed.
